comments.body: What should we put in the Status for fail-open initializers? Shall we make Initializers.Status a list?
nvm. "fail" in fail-open only refers to the failure where the initializer doesn't respond within the time limit, so we'll never have multiple initializers.Status.
why not check the 0 pending and also no error case here instead?
Why are we requiring a fully qualified name?  Just to prevent lazy programmers?
I thought it's to prevent collisions when @deads2k suggested that. @deads2k could you chime in?
